article.headline: La Salle 102, Morgan State 76
article.story: PHILADELPHIA (AP) -- Kimmani Barrett scored 18 points, leading five La Salle players in double figures as the Explorers defeated Morgan State 102-76 Wednesday in the first meeting ever between the schools. Rodney Green added 16 points and Sherman Diaz had 14 for La Salle (6-2), which had all 11 players on the roster in the scoring column. La Salle connected on 37 of 59 shots (62.7 percent) for the game. Joseph McLean had 16 points and Reggie Holmes contributed 15 for the Bears (2-7), who made only 27 of 68 attempts (39.7 percent). Hitting on nine of their first 12, the Explorers jumped out to a 23-12 lead and never looked back. The margin reached 31-10 with 7:21 left in the half after the Explorers hit on seven consecutive layups. La Salle held a 45-24 advantage at the half and took its biggest lead, 84-50, with 7:22 left in the game.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
